paragraph.value: Let us now compare the performance of CIPHER-AVG with that of a vanilla supervised neural model.
scores for the NOUN tag. Even though CIPHER-AVG achieved mixed results (

), the model robustly achieves mid-range performance according to F1-score for all CLs. The results are even more optimistic in terms of recall for English and French, and in terms of precision for Farsi and Swahili.
